channel.title: Portfolio on Girls Who Code at UNC Charlotte
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Girls Who Code at UNC Charlotte

item.title: Build A Weather App
item.description: TÔªøhank you to everyone joining the Build A Weather app event we held last week! Still want to build your own?? No worries down below we have further details about our code documentation and the link to the full code as well.

item.title: Code Lounge
item.description: Come hang out with us on Wednesday, October 26 from 3PM-4PM! Perfect time to hang out, chat, and finish some homework.

item.title: GWC x SHPE Technical Interview Panel
item.description: JÔªøoin GWC and SHPE(Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers) to learn how to better prepare for a technical interview in the tech industry. More information is provided on our Niner Engage, be sure to RSVP as well.

item.title: GWC x WIA | Build A Game Workshop
item.description: WÔªøant to build a short side-scroll game? Join GWC and WIA to learn how to build your own side-scroll game in a group of future animators from WIA and fellow CCI members from GWC.

item.title: Raising Smart Girls Volunteer Opportunity
item.description: About the Program Creators In partnership, Smart Girls HQ and Dottie Rose Foundation will host two cohorts for the Smart Girls Squad program during the 2022/2023 school year

item.title: Code Lounge
item.description: Come hang out with us on October 12th from 3PM-4PM at Woodward 209. Perfect time to hang out, chat, and finish some homework.

item.title: Build A Snake Game
item.description: DÔªøate: October 3rd TÔªøime: 5:30PM Join us to build a spooky snake game!¬†We will teach you everything you need in the workshop – no prior programming knowledge is required!

item.title: Code Lounge
item.description: Come hangout with us on Thursday, September 29th at 3pm at Woodward 209! Perfect time to chat, relax and finish some homework.

item.title: Code Lounge
item.description: Come stop by our Code Lounge on September 15th at 3pm at Woodward 209! Perfect time to relax, hangout with friends, finish some coding homework and chat.

item.title: Create A Tech Bracelet
item.description: This was our first Fall kickoff event where all members were provided supplies to create unique tech bracelets. Along with the usual supplies to create this cool accessory.

item.title: Web Project '22
item.description: WE DID IT! As of May 2nd, 2022, our GWC Web Team has officially launched this new website for our organization! You can see all of the amazing people involved in this project and learn more about the process below.

item.title: Launch Party
item.description: We had so much fun at our Launch Party! üéâ Thank you to everyone who joined us in celebrating our new website launch and congratulating our Web Team members.

item.title: EOY Celebration
item.description: We’ve had an AMAZING year! üòç We want to give a HUGE thank you to all who were a part of our organization this year and a big shoutout to our e-board members who have planned and hosted our events:¬†Elise Frazier,¬†Zaina Shawar,¬†Ashley Harmon,¬†Kaitlyn Gosline,¬†Ayushi Patel, and¬†Chanel Briggs!

item.title: Internship Panel
item.description: We learned some great insights about internships on Friday! We want to give a huge thank you to our wonderful panelists¬†Akshithaa Suresh,¬†Maryalina Shipley, and¬†Quin Chapman¬†for their time and sharing their experiences and knowledge with us.

item.title: Venture Event
item.description: What a fun outdoor bonding experience! ‚òÄÔ∏è We want to give a huge shoutout to Kaitlyn Gosline for organizing this event with Venture Outdoor Leadership, and a huge thank you to all those who joined us on Friday!

item.title: Axe Hacks '22
item.description: What a week! üéâ Thank you all for making our VERY FIRST Axe Hacks so special! We had so much fun getting to know our Hackers and Mentors throughout the week, playing games, learning new tools and languages, and more.
